message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.LG, cs.CV

Reasoning: The paper discusses the interaction between language and perception in situated dialog systems, which is a topic that falls under the sub-categories of natural language processing (cs.CL), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), robotics (cs.RO), machine learning (cs.LG), and computer vision (cs.CV). The focus on computational models of perceptually grounded dialog also suggests a strong connection to these sub-fields.
